name: Littleberg Offset
overview:
Established in the year 2005, we, “Littleberg Offset Co.”, are one of the renowned organizations that are engaged in manufacturing, importing and supplying a comprehensive array of premium quality Printing Machine.

Our Team: Engineers Quality controllers Administrative personnel Warehousing personnel Logistic personnel Skilled & semi-skilled personnel

Quality: Due to the excellent quality of offered Printing Machine, we have been able to gain edge over our industry counterparts. For manufacturing high grade printing machines, we make use of high grade raw material and components that are sourced from the certified vendors of the market. Further, we employ advance machines and latest technology to fabricate these machines.

Our Services: Every “LITTLEBERG”machine is backed by prompt, efficient after Sales - Service and ready availability of Spare parts. Our service team is efficient in both Printing & Mechanism. We have established well knit Branches, Dealer Network & Services Centers covering major cities keeping the size of our country in mind.

Infrastructure: We have constructed a sophisticated infrastructure facility at Vadodara (Gujarat, India), which aids us in manufacturing and supplying high-grade Printing Machine. Sprawling across vast area, our facility helps us in carrying out all business operations smoothly.

Client Satisfaction: Since the inception of our firm, we are working with the foremost goal of attaining complete satisfaction of our esteemed patrons. For the same reason, we are manufacturing and supplying a wide array of superior quality Printing Machine.
